who is the  chancellor of diu?

responses:
Name: Mohammed Shahabuddin
Hon’ble President of the People’s Republic of Bangladesh and Hon’ble Chancellor, Daffodil International University
[Click Here](https://daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/article/chancellor-profile)

patterns: Who is the current Vice Chancellor of the university?
who is the vc of daffodil varsity?
who is the vc vice chancellor of diu?
Can you tell me about any notable achievements or initiatives led by the Vice Chancellor?
How can students or faculty members connect with the Vice Chancellor?
who is the vc of diu?
responses:
Prof. M. Lutfar Rahman, Phd
Contact: vc@daffodilvarsity.edu.bd
Professionalism: He has over 200 research papers and over 100 scientific and technical articles to his credit. He authored/co-authored 16 books on Electronics, Electronic Communications and Computer Science and Engineering. He also supervised many M.Sc. students and Ph.D scholars.

More details[CLICK HERE](https://daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/article/vc-profile)
